Translations.Text: Lxwelf nnsen d asatu i iooan taeallit, ddan d ccehwiyyat. Ad magren ttelfan
Kkes ed wid isteooaen, iumnen, xeddmen ayen ilhan. Wigi, ad kecmen Loennet, ur pwadensen s wacemma
Leonanat n Aaden i Iwaaaed Uenin, i imdanen iS, di tbavnit. Lemaahda S, s tidep, a ppevou
Ur sellen, degs, i yir awal, siwa: "tifrat"! Dinna, lqut nnsen, uubee, tameddit
D tagi ay d Loennet, ara Nerr d lweot, i wid ipeezziben, seg imdanen nne£
Ur d nepuubbu, siwa ma s lameo n Mass ik. IneS i illan zdat nne$, i illan deffir nne$, akked wayen illan garasen. Mass ik ur Iteppu
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ihi, aabed iT, ili d imezgi deg uabad iS. Day tesnev win isaan ism iS
La iqqao umdan: "ma mmute$, day a yi d ssuff$en d amuddir
Day ur icfa ara umdan, ar t id Nxelq, zik, ur illi d acemma
S Mass ik, ara ten Nefser, nitni akked cwaien. Sinna, a ten Nerr ad zzin i Loahennama, $ef tgwecrar

Akken tellam, a pqeobem $uoes. Akka, ar Mass ik, d aseyyi imueeppmen

Mara asen $oen issekniyen iberrzen nne£, qqaoen wid ijehlen i wid iumnen: "menyif sin irebbuyaa di temaict akw i lemwansa
Aceal isuta i Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen, ifen ten tarkunt, uuifa
Ini: "ad Irnu Uenin di laameo, i im$eooqen, alamma walan acu i sen ippuwaaaden: d aaaqeb ne$ d imir. Ad eoen anwa illan deg umkan adiran mavi, ay d bu laaskeo uohifen mavi
Ad Irnu Oebbi nnhaya i wid ipwanhan. Ar Mass ik, leulae idumen ifen akafi, asisi
Ma twalav win iugin issekniyen nne£, u inna: "tarkunt, tarwa ad iyi ppunefkent, war ccekk
Aani issen tabavnit, ne$ iu$ lemaahda s$uo Uenin

Ur twalav ara, Nuzen ed ccwaien i ijehliyen, la ten laajen s ljuo

a Nenheo ijehliyen, d aqwvao, ar Loahennama

Ni$ tebbwim d abeaauq

War ccekk, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Iauzz Uenin
